GDevelop jest wolnym oprogramowaniem do tworzenia gier. Może go używać każdy do tworzenia dowolnego rodzaju gier 2D.
This website in your language: Ta strona jest w Twoim języku
GDevelop was created with love by: GDevelop został stworzony z pasją przez
who added features, fixed bugs, sent new: którzy dodali nowe funkcjonalności, naprawili błędy, przysłali nowe przykłady, tworzyli tutoriale i pomagali społeczności.
BUB is a very special, one of a kind cri: BUB jest bardzo wyjątkowy, jeden z rodzajów zwierzaków. Bardziej specyficzny, ona jest [najbardziej zdumiewającym kotem na tej planecie](http://lilbub.com)... i jej gra jest zrobiona z GDevelop !
The game is a retro 8-bit game, with bea: To gra w stylu 8-bitowych gier retro z piękną oprawą audiowizualną, wieloma poziomami na których poukrywane są różne sekrety jak również z poziomami gdzie musisz pokonać głównego bosa, z wieloma innymi przeciwnikami i bonusami.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-combat roguelike in which you'll blast, dodge and slice your way through masses of technologically inferior enemies.
As your intergalactic intervention missi: As your intergalactic intervention mission progresses, your adaptive hyper-jet will evolve into something stronger and weirder by gathering some of the hundreds of items available in the game.
Imagine and publish your games with GDev: Wymyślaj i twórz swoje gry z GDevelop. Zawiera tutoriale i przykłady.

GDevelop is an open-source project (even: GDevelop jest projektem open source (nawet ta strona): każdy może przyczynić się do jego ulepszania!
There are multiple ways you can contribu: Możesz przyczynić się do rozwoju GDevelop na różne sposoby w zależności od tego ile czasu możesz poświęcić, od Twoich umiejętności i tego w jakim aspekcie chciałbyś ten produkt rozwijać.
GDevelop and the website can be translat: GDevelop oraz ta strona internetowa może być przetłumaczona na Twój język! Mamy do tego specjalną stronę gdzie każdy może dodać swoją cegiełkę tłumacząc część zasobów.
It's easy to get the source code of GDev: Możesz łatwo pobrać kod źródłowy GDevelop i go ulepszać!
The forum and the Discord chat are the p: Forum i czat Discord to miejsce, w którym można uzyskać pomoc i pomagać innym użytkownikom GDevelop!
Follow GDevelop on Facebook and Twitter:: Śledź GDevelop na Facebook i Twitter:
For most beginners and even advanced use: Dla większości początkujących, ale również i zaawansowanych użytkowników, tutoriale i strona pomocy to najbardziej wartościowe zasoby, żeby sprawnie tworzyć świetne gry. Na Wiki możesz pisać własne tutoriale lub poprawiać te, które już tam są.
Download GDevelop or try it online - cre: Pobierz GDevelop lub spróbuj online - twórz gry bez umiejętności programowania
GDevelop is free and can be used for pro: GDevelop jest darmowy i może być używany do tworzenia zarówno darmowych jak i komercyjnych gier.
GDevelop runs on Windows, macOS and most: GDevelop działa na Windows, macOS i najnowszych dystrybucjach Linuksa. Możesz także wypróbować go online używając Chrome, Firefox lub innej nowoczesnej przeglądarki stron.
You need **libgconf-2-4** on your system: You need **libgconf-2-4** on your system. Type `sudo apt-get install libgconf-2-4` in a terminal or install it from your package manager.
To create your first game, start by read: Aby utworzyć swoją pierwszą grę, zacznij od przeczytania tutoriala:
GDevelop is an open-source project. You: GDevelop jest projektem open-source. Możesz zaangażować się w społeczność, aby ją poprawić!
Gdevelop 4 can still be downloaded. GDev: Mimo, że GDevelop 4 nadal można pobrać to GDevelop 5 jest zalecane dla każdego nowego użytkownika, ponieważ GDevelop 4 nie będzie już aktualizowane! Nie przewidujemy wsparcia w przyszłości dla GDevelop 4, dlatego też zalecamy, aby każdy użytkownik GDevelop 4 uaktualnił go do GDevelop 5.
Even if GDevelop 4 supports native games: Nawet jeśli GDevelop 4 obsługuje natywne gry, zalecamy przejście na GDevelop 5 i gry w HTML5, który jest lepiej wspierany. Natywne gry będą dodane to GDevelop później.

Using GDevelop in classroom is a perfect: GDevelop w szkole jest doskonałą okazją, aby uczyć programowania, tworzenia gier i uwolnić kreatywność uczniów.
GDevelop has already been used in classr: GDevelop stosowano już w szkołach i kursach online, używali go zarówno studenci mediów cyfrowych jak i dzieci w pierwszej klasie!
Please send us your photos and tweets if: Przyślij nam zdjęcia albo puść tweeta jeśli używasz GDevelop do prowadzenia kursu!
Make your own Facebook Instant Games wit: Make your own Facebook Instant Games with GDevelop - publish your games on Messenger
With GDevelop, you can export your game: With GDevelop, you can export your game as a Facebook Instant Game in 2 clicks.
1) Create your app on Facebook Developer: 1) Create your app on Facebook Developers
First thing, make sure to have an accoun: First thing, make sure to have an account on **Facebook Developers**. Create an app and configure it to choose "Games" as its category and enables Instant Games in Products:
2) Open GDevelop and export for Facebook: 2) Otwórz GDevelop i wyeksportuj do Natychmiastowych Gier Facebook-a
In GDevelop, open your game and then the: Otwórz swoją grę w GDevelop, a następnie wybierz pozycję Eksport. Wybierz **Facebook Instant Games**, kliknij Eksportuj i poczekaj kilka sekund.
Go back to your game page on Facebook De: Wróć na stronę swojej gry na stronie dla twórców Facebooka, wybierz Web Hosting (hosting w sieci) w menu i **prześlij plik**, który wyeksportowałeś w GDevelop.
You can also add testers to let your fri: You can also add testers to let your friends try your game.
Now, get your phone and **open messenger: Now, get your phone and **open messenger**. Open a conversation, choose Games and click on the icon of your game to start playing to it!
5) Use Instant Games features and publis: 5) Use Instant Games features and publish your game!
GDevelop gave you access to Instant Game: GDevelop gave you access to Instant Games specific features, like the name of the player, to better integrate your game in Messenger conversations.
When your game is ready, submit it for r: When your game is ready, submit it for review by Facebook so that it becomes **available worldwide**!
Features of GDevelop - create any kind o: Features of GDevelop - create any kind of games without coding

create platformer games in a breeze: twórz gry platformowe w mgnieniu oka

And more, to automate current tasks and: I wiele więcej rzeczy, które pozwolą jeszcze bardziej zautomatyzować wszystkie zadania w kilka kliknięć!
The scene editor lets you visually edit: Edytor scen pozwala wizualnie edytować poziomy
Add interfaces and create parallax effec: Dodawaj interfejsy i twórz efekty paralaksy
Create your levels dynamically with exte: Utwórz poziomy dynamicznie za pomocą zewnętrznych układów
a powerful pixel art and sprite editor: a powerful pixel art and sprite editor

Full support for sound effects and music: Full support for sound effects and musics
Build ambitious games with advanced feat: Tworzenie ambitnych gier z zaawansowanymi funkcjami
Communicate with external websites using: Komunikowanie się z zewnętrznymi stronami internetowymi przy pomocy protokołu HTTP

All editors of GDevelop - make platforme: All editors of GDevelop - make platformer, shooter, rpg, action games...
The interface of GDevelop is made of int: The interface of GDevelop is made of intuitive editors to design your own games from scratch.
See how to use GDevelop to add a trigger: See how to use GDevelop to add a trigger in your game in 90 seconds
Design your own levels with the scene ed: Design your own levels with the scene editor: you can choose objects, put them on the scene, adjust their position and size. You can entirely design your levels with the scene editor. If you want to create complex levels or interfaces, the external layouts allow you to create parts of a level and then reuse them in other scenes.
Get started in 2 minutes: Try GDevelop i: Get started in 2 minutes: Try GDevelop in your browser
Imagining and creating the rule of your: Imagining and creating the rule of your game does not imply to learn the syntax of a complex programming language. The events editor displays a sheet of events: each events is composed of conditions and actions. When conditions are fulfilled, actions are run. It's that simple.
All conditions and actions are available: All conditions and actions are available in a list so you can easily discover and find what you want to make the rules of your game.
Learn more about events in the tutorials: Learn more about events in the tutorials
Develop space shooter games with GDevelo: Develop space shooter games with GDevelop
Everything that is displayed on the scre: Everything that is displayed on the screen of your game is an object. Most objects are called sprites: they are composed of animations and can be used for any animated element. For example, your player, enemies or bonuses to pick.
Other object are also available to creat: Other object are also available to create interfaces or add effects to your game: texts, particles, tiled sprites...
Discover all the objects available in GD: Discover all the objects available in GDevelop
All the images and audio files used in y: All the images and audio files used in your game are listed in the Resources Editor. It's a simple way to manage your game assets.
GDevelop comes bundled with free assets: GDevelop comes bundled with free assets to get you started! To quickly prototype and create your own assets, GDevelop is also bundled with a powerful pixel art editor called Piskel.

Examples of GDevelop - make platformer,: Examples of GDevelop - make platformer, shooter, rpg, action games...
GDevelop is bundled with 80+ examples an: GDevelop is bundled with 80+ examples and starters to get you quickly started, learn or try a specific feature.
These are the examples bundled with GDev: These are the examples bundled with GDevelop. Curious? You can open and try them directly from your browser. GDevelop is fast to start and you'll be playing with the examples in seconds.

Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created wit: Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created with GDevelop
A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made: A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made with GDevelop.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-combat roguelike in which you'll blast, dodge and slice your way through masses of technologically inferior enemies. As your intergalactic intervention mission progresses, your adaptive hyper-jet will evolve into something stronger and weirder by gathering some of the hundreds of items available in the game.
Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side pro: Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side project to our now canceled space exploration roguelike Hyperspace Admirals. HDog was prototyped in late 2016, after which it received a limited early access release on itch.io. Over the course of 2017 the majority of its content was developed and continuous alpha feedback was taken into account. The game was feature-complete in march 2018, after which the release was announced.
Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against m: Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against masses of air and ground based enemies
Hundreds of stackable passives, over fif: Hundreds of stackable passives, over fifty weapons and actives; all geared towards producing weird synergies with another
High replayability, your will evolve a l: High replayability, your will evolve a little different on each run
Seven zones with distinct enemy composit: Seven zones with distinct enemy composition to explore
5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming: 5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming with unlockable mk2 loadouts
16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks b: 16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks by Enuit and Ole Toensen
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created wi: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created with GDevelop
A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts: A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, made with GDevelop.
Using GDevelop, the game was made availa: Using GDevelop, the game was made available for iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, Linux and even published as a real Arcade game.
The game was announced for BUB's 5th bir: The game was announced for BUB's 5th birthday. To help making it a reality, a Kickstarter was launched so that all BUB's friends around the world can contribute. The kickstarter was initially launched with $100,000 as the goal, but reached $148,000! GOOD JOB BUB.
Huge variety of unique levels, bosses an: Huge variety of unique levels, bosses and enemies
Unique storyline with twists and surpris: Unique storyline with twists and surprises
Item Inventory: collect items to be used: Item Inventory: collect items to be used strategically throughout the game
Tape Deck feature that allows you to sel: Tape Deck feature that allows you to select your favorite music from the game
Ability to revisit and replay levels to: Ability to revisit and replay levels to further your progress and unlock achievements
GDevelop - Create games without programm: GDevelop - Stwórz grę bez zbędnego programowania - Open Source Kreator gier natywnych oraz technologi HTML5
GDevelop game maker software - create vi: GDevelop game maker software - create video games without coding
Make your own games with GDevelop: Make your own games with GDevelop
GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platfo: GDevelop jest multiplatformowym wolnym oprogramowaniem typu open source, które może być używane przez wszystkich - umiejętności programowania nie są wymagane.
Unleash your creativity with GDevelop an: Unleash your creativity with GDevelop and create any kind of game: platformers, puzzles, shoot 'em up, strategy, [8-bit games](/make-8bit-pixelart-games)... Go through the examples or start a new project from scratch.
With GDevelop, you can make simple proje: With GDevelop, you can make simple projects for fun or create ambitious indie games like [Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH](/games/lil-bub-hello-earth), [Hyperspace Dogfights](/games/hyperspace-dogfights) and [tons of other games](/games-showcase)!
What makes GDevelop unique and so easy t: Tym co sprawia, że GDevelop jest tak wyjątkowy i łatwy w użyciu są zdarzenia. Dzięki tak potężnemu narzędziu bez problemu przedstawisz logikę swojej gry, bez potrzeby uczenia się jakiegokolwiek języka programowania.
Events being used in GDevelop to create: Events being used in GDevelop to create the logic of a game
When Space is pressed, the character ani: Po naciśnięciu spacji, animacja postaci i dźwięk są odtwarzane. Jeśli bomba dotknie naszego bohatera, oba te obiekty są niszczone.
Publish your games to the web, iOS, Andr: Publish your games to the web, iOS, Android, Windows, Mac, Linux and even [Facebook Messenger](/facebook-instant-games). Games created with GDevelop run anywhere and you can even do a one-click export to Android from the app.
Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, ma: Twórz gry dla iOS, Android, Windows, macOS i Linux
Laptop, tablets or phone: games made wit: Laptop, tablets or phone: games made with GDevelop can run everywhere
Express your ideas without being blocked: Express your ideas without being blocked: you can prototype new features on your games in minutes, and refine them without limits. [Making games](/games-showcase) as never been as easy as assembling your ideas with [the visual editors](/game-editors) provided by GDevelop.
Want to go even further? You can extend: Want to go even further? You can extend the [game engine with Javascript](/javascript-game-engine).
See how to add a trigger button to your: See how to add a trigger button to your platformer game in 90 seconds
[Tons of examples](/game-examples-starte: [Tons of examples](/game-examples-starters) are also available and ready to be tried in one click.
Tutorials for GDevelop and documentation: Poradniki dla GDevelop i dokumentacja na Wiki
Using JavaScript to make your games with: Using JavaScript to make your games with GDevelop
GDevelop supports JavaScript to create y: GDevelop supports JavaScript to create your game or extend the game engine.
JavaScript can be used to write part of: JavaScript can be used to write part of a game, alongside with events
Add JavaScript code blocks inside your g: Add JavaScript code blocks inside your game
GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code: GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code blocks at any point in the events of your game. It's a good way to implement a complex algorithm or reuse functions from open-source libraries. Events and code blocks can seamlessly be mixed together - so you can implement parts or even the totality of your game with JavaScript!
The JavaScript editor is based on the su: The JavaScript editor is based on the super powerful Monaco Editor, extracted from [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/). Intellisense autocompletions are provided and the editor supports advanced features like multi-selection for faster coding.
GDevelop is modular and can be extended: GDevelop is modular and can be extended to suit your needs. In particular, all features available to games (objects, behaviors, events) are based on the extension system. You can quickly create new extensions for your game or contribute to existing ones as GDevelop is [open-source](https://github.com/4ian/GD).
The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. T: The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. The code editor also comes bundled with several beautiful themes!
Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games: Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games
Sprite editor and tools to make your own: Sprite editor and tools to make your own 8bit games with GDevelop
See Piskel sprite editor being used insi: See Piskel sprite editor being used inside GDevelop to make a 8bit game
GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https:: GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https://www.piskelapp.com/), a powerful and easy to use 2D sprite editor. It's the perfect tool to create pixel art assets to give a retro feeling to your game! You can create objects with multiple animations, edit at any time the sprites and see the result by launching a preview of your game.
Want to create a retro platformer game?: Want to create a retro platformer game? GDevelop has a pre-made behaviors that you can attach to your character and your platforms. In a few seconds you have a basic platformer game running and ready to be customized and enhanced! Other behaviors, conditions and actions can also be used to create any kind of 2D games: shmup, "Bullet Hell", arcade games...
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made with GDevelop
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit g: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, which alternates between platformers levels, with hidden secrets, and shooter levels with bosses, multiple enemies and bonuses.
